full_text:
Re: Epstein, Jeffrey Edward, Reg. No. 76318-054
From: Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
To: Charisma Edge
Date: 2019/07/18 15:17
Subject: Re: Epstein, Jeffrey Edward, Reg. No. 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Thanks. Not surprised due to [redacted] not receiving bail.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From: Charisma Edge [redacted] @bop.gov>
Date: 7/18/19 2:02 PM (GMT-06:00)
To: Lee Plourde [redacted] @bop.gov>, Lamine N'Diaye [redacted] @bop.gov>, [redacted] @bop.gov>, "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [redacted] @bop.gov>
Subject: Epstein, Jeffrey Edward, Reg. No. 76318-054
>>> "Charisma Edge" 07/18/2019 15:02 >>>
FYI...Epstein was not granted bail. He returned from court wo incident.
Charisma Edge
Associate Warden (O)
FCI Estill
100 Prison Road
Estill, SC 29918
803-625-[redacted]
[redacted] @bop.gov
EST/AW-Operations~@bop.gov
Page 2347
DOJ-OGR-00023712
